title: 【停車公告】志學火車站停車場停車場地有限，請勿長期占用停車格
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 林嘉瑩 - tea7101@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906226
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【停車公告】志學火車站停車場停車場地有限，請勿長期占用停車格
日期： Thu, 23 Jan 2025 08:59:59 +0800

各位師長及同學好：
因志學火車站停車場可供停車數量有限，請勿長期占用停車格。凡未張貼標示有113學年度識別貼紙之機、脚踏車或廢棄物，為不占用現有停車格，請盡速駛離或移除，若未移除之無主車輛者，將依廢棄物清理法即花蓮縣未懸掛號牌廢棄車輛清除處理自治條例草案辦理，並逕向占用人求償所生費用，轉知全校師生知悉並請配合辦理。

                                                                                             學務處生輔組關心您

Please inform the Zhixue Railway Station publicity. Due to the limited parking space at the railway station, please park any motor vehicles or waste at Zhixue Railway Station and move them away as soon as possible to avoid occupying existing parking spaces. If you have not removed them, Ownerless vehicles will be handled in accordance with the Waste Disposal Act, which is the Hualien County Autonomous Regulations on the Removal and Disposal of Abandoned Vehicles Without License Plates, and the occupants will be directly required to compensate for the expenses incurred. All teachers and students in the school are informed and are requested to cooperate in the handling. 

Student Living Services Division
Office of Student Affairs
